A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
An hour too long. Way too many filler scenes. Surprisingly ep.7 had better pacing than this and it pains me to admit that. 

Too many inconsistencies.

Finn was a waste of movie footage

Although there were some great scenes in this.

Kylo Ren was way more entertaining in this one

Mark Hamill was great as usual as Luke bringing the spiritual aspect back in the saga but it was too late
